abstract: Embedded in the rules that the government is imposing on Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal is one that specifically benefits Bloomberg L.P., the financial news giant that owns Bloomberg Television.
snippet: Embedded in the rules that the government is imposing on Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal is one that specifically benefits Bloomberg L.P., the financial news giant that owns Bloomberg Television.
lead_paragraph: Embedded in the rules that the government is imposing on Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal is one that specifically benefits Bloomberg L.P., the financial news giant that owns Bloomberg Television.

headline.main: In Comcast-NBC Conditions, a Victory for Bloomberg

abstract: In its successful bid to acquire NBC Universal, Comcast was not forced to sell off any assets. It did agree, however, to give up NBC’s management role in Hulu, the premier online TV Web site, while retaining a financial stake.
snippet: In its successful bid to acquire NBC Universal, Comcast was not forced to sell off any assets. It did agree, however, to give up NBC’s management role in Hulu, the premier online TV Web site, while retaining a financial stake.
lead_paragraph: In its successful bid to acquire NBC Universal, Comcast was not forced to sell off any assets. It did agree, however, to give up NBC’s management role in Hulu, the premier online TV Web site, while retaining a financial stake.

headline.main: Comcast to Give Up NBC’s Management Role at Hulu

abstract: The assent carried a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.
snippet: The assent carried a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.
lead_paragraph: Comcast received government approval Tuesday to acquire NBC Universal, emerging from a lengthy review with a list of conditions, the most important aimed at preventing the new media conglomerate from thwarting competition in online video.

headline.main: Comcast Receives Approval for NBC Universal Merger
headline.print_headline: Comcast Receives Approval For NBC Universal Merger

byline.original: By Tim Arango and Brian Stelter
